snippet: A Muslim preacher, Abu Hamza al-Masri, lost an appeal Friday against extradition to the United States.
abstract: British court approves extradition of five detainees, including firebrand Muslim cleric Abu Hamza al-Masri, to United States on terrorism charges.

byline.original: By SARAH LYALL and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Sarah Lyall reported from London, and Alan Cowell from Paris. Charlie Savage contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: A Muslim preacher, Abu Hamza al-Masri, lost an appeal Friday against extradition to the United States.

headline.seo: British Judges Approve Extradition of Muslim Cleric
headline.main: British Judges Approve Extradition of Muslim Cleric to U.S. on Terrorism Charges
headline.print_headline: British Judges Approve Extradition of Muslim Cleric to U.S. on Terrorism Charges
